Yay I finally get my bike pic. Cept you still owe me the one of you wheeling around on one LOL
   
  Now how did I know it would be THAT color? =) Very nice Frank you did a great job on it. I saw the instructions for the recumbents before and it made pretty good sense especially if you have no fear of welding to add on extra features.
   
  Misty

Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
          I have to get these finished now. This is a home made recumbent. That's the 
trouble with knowing how to do stuff, there's no off time! Does this 
beginning instructions make any sense?

Frank
